inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addWeaponProficiency('Handaxe'); effect.getBonuses().addWeaponProficiency('Battleaxe'); effect.getBonuses().addWeaponProficiency('Greataxe'); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Proficiency, Axes
description: You are able to use most axes in combat.  This includes handaxes, battleaxes, and two handed greataxes.
